text: I haven't finished my personal statement or UCAS application but hopefully should be done the Nov the 7th .. The universities i like so far are Kent Warwick Bristol.. Because im only doing one science ..my university options are VERY limited.. Most uni is require ta sciences for Biology
Its kind off stressful thinking about universities .. I mean what if i get into a uni and i regret going there? How was your time when choosing universities ?

Try not to stress. No point - won't help. It's all good. university is university - the experience is pretty similar everywhere.

I didn't work hard enough in my last year of uni so didn't end up going to the university I wanted, but I still had a good time at university. Worked hard, and got an training contract with an accounting firm when I left.

I didn't regret where I went to university, only that I didn't work hard enough to get to the best possible university that I could. So my advice would be not to stress about where at university, but to focus on getting the best grades possible because that will give you the most options.
How is the personal statement going?
